Cerebrus' pod would have landed on the island.

::Zardus::

"No," Zardus replies to Demolition, walking out of the Iron 
Fist, "The base is on lockdown for now."

He approaches Cerebrus. "I am Zardus," he says, "You're the one 
Magmatron sent?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Scratch my last post with Demo. I though he was in the Alliance
> base not the IF.
> 
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He got out of the CR chamber. He made his way to, and down the 
tunnel to
> the Alliance base. He opened the comm.
> "Zardus, its Demolition. Could you let me in?"
> 
> OOC: Hey, does anyone know where Dollon is or what he is doing. I 
could

but I
